changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.TimeSeriesSource (timeseries_id, source_id, lead) SELECT FS.forecast_id, FS.source_id, S.lead FROM wres.ForecastSource FS INNER JOIN wres.Source S ON S.source_id = FS.source_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.TimeSeriesSource TSS WHERE TSS.timeseries_id = FS.forecast_id AND TSS.source_id = FS.source_id AND TSS.lead = S.lead );
changeSet.comment: The wres.ForecastSource table has been removed.

changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.TimeSeriesValue (timeseries_id, lead, series_value) SELECT FV.timeseries_id, FV.lead, FV.forecasted_value FROM wres.ForecastValue FV WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.TimeSeriesValue TSV WHERE TSV.timeseries_id = FV.timeseries_id AND TSV.lead = FV.lead AND TSV.series_value = FV.forecasted_value );
changeSet.comment: Removed wres.ForecastValue since it was replaced by wres.TimeSeriesValue

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.VariableFeature (variable_id, feature_id) SELECT variable_id, x_position FROM wres.VariablePosition VP WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.VariableFeature VF WHERE VF.variable_id = VP.variable_id AND VF.feature_id = VP.x_position );
